item.title: Spanish Speaking Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Spanish-speaking short form editor to support us on a project for one of our clients.

I run a leading influencer marketing agency based in the UK focusing on gaming, tech and entertainment clients.

We have an exciting project for a mobile gaming client in which we need to create a number of short form videos in Spanish.

How the project works is we currently gift mobile phone controllers to influencers who create and make content for our use.

We would then need a talented Spanish-speaking short form editor to make edits to the content the influencers provide. These assets will then be used on Instagram reels, stories, tiktoks and facebook

You would have to do editing work such as:

- Adding on screen text
- Transitions
- Effects
- Cutting and Splicing
- Editing different pieces of content together
- and more

This will not be a massive amount of work and we are looking to work on a pay per edit basis and likelihood is you would have a maximum of 5-7 simple edits per month for the following 6 months.

Should this go well, we would look to onboard you for more projects with Spanish clients or English speaking clients.

Please apply if this is you and attach your portfolio of short form edits and also your rate per edit.

To progress to an interview for this role we would be looking for you to create a sample edit for us using footage that we provide so we can verify the quality of your work.

item.title: Online webinar host/tutor/teacher for video marketing course business - Upwork
item.description:
We are a leading video marketing business seeking a fluent English-speaking online webinar host to present our video marketing training courses. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in video marketing, excellent presentation skills, and the ability to engage and educate our audience effectively. While this job is initially for one webinar, there is potential for ongoing work if the fit is right.

Responsibilities:

- Host live online webinars to promote our video marketing training courses.
- Present course content clearly and professionally, answering audience questions and providing insights.
- Engage with participants to ensure an interactive and valuable learning experience.
- Collaborate with our team to develop and refine webinar content.
- Provide feedback on audience engagement and suggest improvements for future webinars.

Requirements:

- Fluent in English with excellent verbal communication skills.
- Proven experience in hosting webinars, online presentations, or similar roles.
- Strong background in video marketing with a deep understanding of its principles and strategies.
- Ability to engage and connect with an audience, answering questions and addressing concerns in real-time.
- Reliable internet connection and professional-quality audio/video setup for seamless webinar delivery.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Previous experience in a training or educational role, particularly in marketing or video production.
- Familiarity with webinar software platforms (e.g., Zoom, GoToWebinar, Webex).
- Strong organisational skills and attention to detail.

About Us:

We are a dynamic video marketing business dedicated to helping businesses enhance their in-house marketing capabilities through high-quality training courses. Our mission is to empower companies to create compelling video content that drives engagement and growth.

How to Apply:

If you are passionate about video marketing and have the skills to deliver engaging and informative webinars, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your application with:

1. A brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience.
2. Examples of previous webinars or presentations you have hosted (if available).
3. Your availability and rate for the initial webinar.

While this post is for a single webinar, there is potential for ongoing work based on performance. We look forward to working with a talented professional who can help us showcase the value of our training courses to potential clients.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$54.00

item.description:
Hey there! I'm looking for a talented social media manager to join our team. We are Luxia Stocks, an aesthetic stock video content tailored for brands, faceless accounts, and creators across platforms like Instagram Reels and TikTok. We're seeking a creative and detail-oriented Part-Time Social Media Manager to join our growing team.

Responsibilities:

- Create compelling and visually appealing content for Instagram Reels, TikToks, and other social media platforms.
- Develop and execute social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement.
- Implement community management tactics to foster a vibrant and engaged community around our brand.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to drive traffic and conversions to our waitlist and upcoming launches.
- Monitor social media channels for trends and opportunities, and provide insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.
- Stay updated with social media best practices, tools, and trends to ensure maximum effectiveness of campaigns.

*MUST PROVIDE A PORTFOLIO TO APPLY*

- Proven experience in managing social media accounts, preferably in a creative or visual content-focused role.
- Strong understanding of Instagram and TikTok platforms, including their respective algorithms and best practices.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills with a knack for storytelling.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced startup environment.
- Creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas and content strategies.
- Familiarity with social media analytics and reporting tools.
- Passion for aesthetics, visual storytelling, and content creation.

If you're passionate about social media, aesthetics, and creating engaging content that resonates with audiences, we'd love to hear from you!
